basics.name: Ahmed Nasser
basics.label: Software Engineer
basics.summary:
<markdown>
            ### **Summary**  
                I am a **Software Engineer** with a strong background in **backend development**. I hold a **Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science** and have experience in **C++, Python, JavaScript, and TypeScript**. My expertise includes **Node.js, Express.js, Flask, Docker, PostgreSQL, and CI/CD pipelines**.  
                I have developed projects such as a **Spyware Detector**, achieving **96.3% accuracy**, and a **real-time chat application** optimized for performance and scalability. I am also familiar with **QEMU, SystemC/TLM modeling, Linux/RTOS environments, and microprocessor architectures**.  
                I am passionate about **building efficient, high-performance software** and continuously expanding my knowledge in **AI, and software engineering best practices**.
            </markdown>

education.institution: Faculty of Computers and Information, Fayoum University, Egypt

work.summary:
Implemented a **frontend and Django API-- for the company project’s pipeline, resulting in:
                - **25%** increase in project efficiency.
                - **30%** reduction in errors.
                - Collaborated with a team of **6 developers** to deliver the project on time
